subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Daisuke Matsuzaka pitched his first major league complete game last night and the Boston Red Sox took their biggest lead in the standings in 12 seasons with a 7-1 victory against the visiting Detroit Tigers in the first game of a four-game series between the American League’s two top teams.
snippet: Daisuke Matsuzaka pitched his first major league complete game last night and the Boston Red Sox took their biggest lead in the standings in 12 seasons with a 7-1 victory against the visiting Detroit Tigers in the first game of a four-game series...
